price: Nyuma mumuboheshe umunyururu ufite uburebure bwa Dhira’a[1] mirongo irindwi.
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ
footnotes: [1] Dhira’a ni bumwe mu buryo bwa kera bwifashishwaga mu gupima uburebure bw’ikintu. Dhira’a imwe ingana na santimetero hafi mirongo irindwi n’eshanu (75 cm).

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
